vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔγκληρ-ος, ον,
having a lot or share in.., with genitive, οὔθ᾽ ὑμεναίων ἔ. [Refs 5th c.BC+]; λαχεῖν ἔγκληρά τινι to have an equal share with.., [Refs]
__2 having a share of an inheritance, heir or heiress, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἔ. εὐνή a marriage which brings wealth, [Refs]; ἔ. πεδία land possessed as an inheritance, [Refs]
__3 Astrology texts, occupying a κλῆρος, Serapioin [Refs]
